title: The Same Blood
description: A dark, malevolent secret returns to seek vengeance… Claude Durst, awakens to the tale of two soulmates who try to overcome seemingly insurmountable odds to find a way to be together. Once Claude is forced upon the knowledge of his heritage, he still finds a fight with unconscious. A dirty trap of unimaginable outcomes play out. His daughter, Claudia Hanson, is left alone to calm the tide of the innocent guilty. Only by embracing the darkness within her can she overcome the evil riddled over generations. Trouble is, she doesn’t know the power lurking within her soul… Not yet. But she’s about to find out.
author: Ronder Scott Pradhan
